headline: This Metric Predicts Outperformance, Trivariate Says. These 22 Stocks Pass the Test.
summary: Trivariate Research President Adam Parker’s research shows that gross margin growth is the strongest predictor of future stock performance.

headline: EA and Full Circle Reveal September 16 Early Access Release Date for skate.
summary: REDWOOD CITY, Calif., August 26, 2025--Today, Electronic Arts Inc. (NASDAQ: EA) and Full Circle announced that skate., the next chapter of the award-winning skateboarding video game franchise, will launch into Early Access on September 16 for PlayStation® 5, Xbox Series X|S, PlayStation® 4, Xbox One, and PC via Steam, Epic Games Store and EA app. skate. is free-to-download, cross-platform,* and cross-progression,* making it as accessible as possible for both longtime skate. franchise fans, and n

headline: AI-Powered Sports Launches Might Change the Case for Investing in Electronic Arts (EA)
summary: Earlier this month, Electronic Arts Inc. launched Madden NFL 26, introducing advanced AI-driven gameplay and expanded platform availability, while also unveiling new ICONs and gameplay experiences for EA SPORTS FC 26 ahead of its September release. This double rollout showcases EA's ability to refresh its top sports franchises using innovation and wider accessibility to engage both existing fans and new players. We'll explore how the AI-powered enhancements in Madden NFL 26 could shape...

headline: Electronic Arts Inc. (EA): A Bull Case Theory
summary: We came across a bullish thesis on Electronic Arts Inc. on TickerTrends Research’s Substack by TickerTrends. In this article, we will summarize the bulls’ thesis on EA. Electronic Arts Inc.’s share was trading at $170.68 as of August 19th. EA’s trailing and forward P/E were 42.67 and 20.62 respectively according to Yahoo Finance. Battlefield 6 is shaping […]

headline: 3 Profitable Stocks We Think Twice About
summary: Even if a company is profitable, it doesn’t always mean it’s a great investment. Some struggle to maintain growth, face looming threats, or fail to reinvest wisely, limiting their future potential.

raw.headline: 3 Profitable Stocks We Think Twice About
raw.summary: Even if a company is profitable, it doesn’t always mean it’s a great investment. Some struggle to maintain growth, face looming threats, or fail to reinvest wisely, limiting their future potential.
